website_summaries.verdict: The Marshall Monitor headphone pair is a victory of style, for sure, but there's also plenty of substance here in the form of deep, rich bass and crisp highs.
pros: Powerful, clean audio performance with deep bass response
Removable audio filters for personal audio preference?warmer or brighter
Detachable cable has inline remote, microphone, can be attached to either ear cup
cons: Inline remote is only single button, can't adjust volume

customer_reviews.title: Classy little cans.
customer_reviews.text: These have some of the most comfortable ear cups I've ever tried on headphones of this size. Seriously, these are stupid comfy. The sound quality is also really well balanced and fairly bright without the felt dampeners. Really clear sound and are definitely the top end of the casual spectrum and not a bad entry point for budding mobile audiophiles.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kertzman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound clarity with enough bass
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great sound from these headphones! Really wanted a nice pair for myself and shopped around for a while. Came down to these or beats. I do listen to mostly hip hop or rap but chose these because of the sound clarity. Beats has the bass down but I dislike how "muffled" they sound. These Marshall headphones have enough bass to satisfy me but the overall sound quality is what puts these over the top IMO. They do have a filter you can keep in or take out very easily as the pads are magnet attached. I personally leave the filters out. Love that sound clarity and loudness. Overall I am extreamly happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Haman

customer_reviews.title: They serve their purpose, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of concerns about the headphones. One, perhaps a minor one as one gets used to them, is not knowing how long to depress the button to get them to Bluetooth connect. The second one is more serious in that there is slight but noticeable background noise when being used. The sound reproduction itself appears clear and correct, so again I can get used to it. The bottom line though is that the headphones satisfy my need of being able to listen to music, not being hampered by a cord connection, and not imposing my choice of music on others in the household.
customer_reviews.author: P.A.C.Oldfield

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous Quality and Value!
customer_reviews.text: At $118?!?!?! these cans are a steal! Built sturdy and collapsable for easy safekeeping. Sound is well balanced and soundstage is wide for a closed ear pair. I prefer the FTF on, the highs are at almost piercing level without them, but to each their own, nice that Marshall brought that choice to the listener. Minor qualms would be the plug input on both headsets are quite snug, meaning if you're gonna pull the plug when packing this baby, it requires a stronger pull than normal, although the jacks are sturdy and seems well built, not sure if this will cause wear in time. Hoping the jack will loosen through enough use.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good at noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. The only headphones that cancel out all sound around me. I work from home and use headphones with worship music to control distractions from guitar playing kids and other household noise. These work so well, I can't even hear when they are talking to me. My husband had to tap me on the shoulder to tell me the oven was beeping 15 or 20 feet from me.
customer_reviews.author: Kivak

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, poor materials, very substandard warranty.
customer_reviews.text: After 4 years of very limited use the material on the ear pads and inner headband disintegrated. See photos as this product was not abused and very well maintained. Communications with Marshall illustrated a few things; they only warrant their products sold through a 3rd party for 6 months, this delamination of material was deemed to be from normal wear and tear. Look at the photos and decide for yourself - is this what you expect after taking care of the product and very limited use over 4 years?
customer_reviews.author: M. Botella

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with high quality sound delivery
customer_reviews.text: Comfort and sound quality is about what I would expect from Marshall, awesome! I can wear them for hours at a time with no problem and they do a great job at delivering great sound with minimal background noise bleeding through. The only complaint is that they could be a little beefier as far as the volume and quality of the sound at those higher volumes, at times I could definitely tell I was nearing the end of what the speakers are capable of delivering.
customer_reviews.author: D. Decoster

customer_reviews.title: These sound fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my nephew instead of the more expensive Beats By Dre. I'm so glad I did. These things sound fantastic. I also like the fact that they can we used wirelessly or with a plug. I think I'm going to get a pair for myself now.
customer_reviews.author: Martinex

customer_reviews.title: 100% Quality 🔥🔥🔥
customer_reviews.text: 100% Quality 🔥🔥🔥Once you feel these the first time you know you purchased an awesome pair. Sound quality hits, very crisp and clear. Versatile headphone.
customer_reviews.author: StonedSamurai

customer_reviews.title: Really, really good headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are fantastic. I have been using mine for about 2.5 years now and they have held up wonderfully. Sound quality hasn't diminished and they have not had any issues structurally. These are not sound cancelling, but reduce external sound significantly. They are also very low profile compared to the bulky Beats or Bose over-ears. Considering the price/quality ratio these are a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of wireless monster beats for the last couple years and I really enjoyed them. Then I walked in Best Buy and saw these. The sound was just outstanding. Better than the Beats which is not surprising since this company has been in the music business for a long time. They know how music is supposed to sound. They are super sturdy and seem like they will last. The cord provided is also strong. They fit comfortably as well. I can hear every detail of the song; highs, mids, and lows. The best headphones I have owned so far. I think if they can make them bluetooth ones they would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Domingo R

customer_reviews.title: Great little headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several over the ear head phones and could never find any I could wear for any length of time. Until now. These are comfortable and not to tight. They are easily adjustable. I like the fact you can switch sides with the cord. Like most they can get your ears hot after a while, but that goes with this style. Overall, these are just great head phones.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip W.

customer_reviews.title: Not so  "over the ears" headphones
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great sound. Treble a bit muted but better after removing cloth "filter". Hefty weight. Like the tactile feel on the outside of the cans. Low profile cans. Cons: Tad tight for larger heads. Cans are too small to be "over the ears" headphones for medium to large ears. They should be classified as "on-ears".
customer_reviews.author: Ben Q

customer_reviews.title: Too tight :(
customer_reviews.text: So I think my head is way to big for them. After a few hours of wearing them I get a headache from temples being pushed down by them. I'm sad. Sound quality is decent. I wish the control thing on the cord had volume function. Floppy headphones are certainly bad, but ones too tight aren't good either.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Look cool, sound better
customer_reviews.text: Amazing noise cancelling. Works with your computer, your phone, your anything with a headphone jack. I will say that if you wear them for a while you will have very sweaty ears! But it's the trade off you get for great noise cancellation and amazing sound quality. Watch movies, play video games, audio/video conference, what ever... And they look cool.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Duel

customer_reviews.title: No regrets are had in purchasing these.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, both in sound and build, for the price!! I've been using these as my primary headphones for almost two years now and have been extremely pleased with them. They have received very heavy use in the past two years, and also been stowed loosely in the large compartment of my backpack on a daily basis with other items, and have held up with no noticeable flaws in build or sound quality. 10/10, would recommend. TLDR Buy them. I've had them for two years and they're awesome, both in sound quality and build.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Morrow

customer_reviews.title: This headphones are awesome! I thinks are the better I bought
customer_reviews.text: This headphones are awesome! I thinks are the better I bought. The quality sound is great. I love the bass that can be reproduce in them.
customer_reviews.author: CrisBro

customer_reviews.title: Great durable headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, solid build that's very durable. I've had these headphones for almost 2 years and have never had a problem. I tend to be very rough with my headphones and these definitely stand up. There great for travel, they fold up really small and they've travelled with me almost constantly over the past couple of years. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones you can buy for the money. The sound of these blows BOSE out of the water. They have the deepest bass out of all over the ear headphones I have tried. My only complaint is the pads seem to fit a smaller ear, so if you have bigger ears like me and wear these for more than an hour it may start to get uncomfortable. I usually don't have a problem with it because I usually don't wear them longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: BeSharp

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for money!!! and I'm an audio snob...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is nearly to totally flat (warm sound) and high end can be achieved easily by removing F.T.F filters. Headphones material is high quality everywhere, even the cable received is an high quality one. For that price, these headphones gives you more than 300$ headphones in the market today.
customer_reviews.author: Nisim Simsolo

customer_reviews.title: For the Price, Quality is HIGH
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't review a product unless I really love it, or really hate it. In this case, I love these headphones. The sound is fantastic for the price. I've been wearing them just about everyday for the past year I purchased them. Only bad thing that happened is the aux cord that came with it broke after 10 months, but this was more my fault than I think manufacturing. The bass is great, and the highs are clean. These headphones are built for any genre. I still own and use the bag that comes with it as well. Anyways, good luck finding great headphones like this in the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Wichterich

customer_reviews.title: Nice build. Too much bass. Not for vocal recording.
customer_reviews.text: I got this headphones to replace my 2yo Audio Technica ATH-M30. I do SoundCloud music covers so I primarily use the headphones for vocal recordings. This is a nice pair of headphones. No doubt about that. It's build is excellent and it doesn't feel flimsy or cheap. However my main problem is the actual sound it's producing. It has too much bass. That said, it is not fit for me for my intended use. I went to Best Buy, tried on other pairs and found that the Sony MDRXB950BT/B sounds 500% better than this. Though that model has extra bass, it's not as much as this one.
customer_reviews.author: KIM RIVERA

customer_reviews.title: Husband and Son both like these!
customer_reviews.text: Great noise cancellors! Even cuts out noise from wife and moms!
customer_reviews.author: alaskagirl

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I just got them and I have been giving a test drive for 2 hours already and I have to say I'm pleased with their performance. Depending on what genre you're listening, you can make a few adjustments on your music player device (in my case iPhone) and you'll be set!
customer_reviews.author: Jafet

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Gift EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas- he's a music purist and quite picky about sound quality but these were a HIT! I am wife of the year. These headphones have a remarkable sound. My husband mostly listens to soundtracks, classical, and any music other than metal and hip hop. It seems to suit these headphones perfectly for his music preference.
customer_reviews.author: Lester

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, doesn't cancel out all outside sound but it's great for studying. Does make ears warm.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and even though I bought them a while ago, the quality has been awful, they are not real Marshall!! They are FAKE, a Counterfeit! It fell apart shortly after
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bassy and muddy sounding.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and feel nice, pretty light too. Bought these as a present for someone; I love my own Sennheiser Momentums and unfortunately the sound of these Marshalls is nothing like those. These are much bassier, and muddy to my ears. Seriously sounds like listening to music through the medium of a particularly wooly sheep.
customer_reviews.author: john li

customer_reviews.title: easily detachable/replaceable magnetic ear pads
customer_reviews.text: Apart from crystal clear sound, these headphones are almost unkillable -- metal frame, easily detachable/replaceable magnetic ear pads, detachable/replaceable/stretchable wire. It's an ideal match if your device has an equalizer, so you can use presets for the type of music you're listening to.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: I received this product with the right side headphone not ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this product with the right side headphone not working and I've tried it on different devices so it's not my device(s) HIGHLY DISSATISFIED usually these headphones are phenomenal
customer_reviews.author: Duran S.

customer_reviews.title: Loved so much I had to buy a second pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Marshal Monitor headphones a few months back for myself. The musical note in these is very elegant. You hear the music very crisp throughout the volume range. My wife used them on a plane ride and she immediately wanted a pair of her own.
customer_reviews.author: Herman Avilez

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Looks are pretty good fits well on my ears. The only thing is noise canceling is not upto the mark.. but other than that a brilliant product.
customer_reviews.author: Rupal Maravi

customer_reviews.title: Made for Rock and Roll!
customer_reviews.text: I found these headphones at a Best Buy I go too, they were out for anybody to try, so I walked over and put them on. I was blown away, so a few weeks later I ordered them off amazon because they were $50 dollars cheaper.I have owned plenty of headphones, but none have come close to these. I originally owned JVCs XX on- ear headphones, but they have treble so high, that it was uncomfortable to listen to bands like Judas Priest or Iron Maiden. These are made for Rock and Roll lovers, but they are also for Jazz,Blues,Heavy Metal(any subgenre) and Classical listeners. So if your looking for a great pair of headphones, these are the pair.
customer_reviews.author: colton brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Good sound,Ears get a bit hot in these if using more than 20 min
customer_reviews.author: Chad Aulwes

customer_reviews.title: The sound was good.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small head (I have to wear children sized hats and such). These are kind of large on me but still make my ears/head hurt after just 30 minutes of wearing them (may be due to wearing glasses too?). The sound was good.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Butler

customer_reviews.title: First tested these in a Big Box store and loved their compact size and awesome sounds
customer_reviews.text: First tested these in a Big Box store and loved their compact size and awesome sounds. Purchased online and have used daily for five weeks now. These seem to be holding up quite well. These replaced an over the ear Sennheiser set and are far more comfortable. I'd recommend these to a friend
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very professional. It blocks ambient noise perfectly. Very confortable.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C Palacios

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: I always showed extra care for this headphone. I carried it in a hard case. I gently used it. However, one side of the headphone is not working. There is no sound from the left side. It only lasts a year. This was my second Marshall headphone and both of them are a big disappointment to me. I will never buy a Marshall headphone anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Emek Karakilic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything is very good. Only the box is missing. but it is not important. thank you friend
customer_reviews.author: Vahan

customer_reviews.title: Received two defective units
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for Christmas. No sound on one side. Ordered another to replace. No sound on one side. Really?
customer_reviews.author: NYC Bushbaby

customer_reviews.title: It isn't the best looking headphones out there but the quality is great ...
customer_reviews.text: It isn't the best looking headphones out there but the quality is great and the fact that the cord is detachable just extends its lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: GX107785

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound is amazing and these are super comfortable to wear for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Isch

customer_reviews.title: They came in perfect condition and on time and they are exactly what ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a trip out-to-sea on a Naval Air Craft Carrier....it get extremely noisy and these have worked out perfectly. They came in perfect condition and on time and they are exactly what we were looking for. So you can transport yourself to another place and be immersed in music!
customer_reviews.author: DunBee

customer_reviews.title: Sound produced is great. Even if it is not BT enabled
customer_reviews.text: Sound produced is great. Even if it is not BT enabled, my husband enjoys it too much...
customer_reviews.author: Mikmibeangirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with these headphones. I purchased these a few months back and while I am writing this review I am wearing them. They are such high quality and still work like the day I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Chase D.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! I love them!
customer_reviews.text: BEST HEADPHONES IVE EVER PURCHASED!!! Very pleased with the quality, sound and durability. I purchased them a little over a year ago and have never had a problem with them. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable. The sound is great once you remove the ...
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable. The sound is great once you remove the felt thing inside the headphones, which looks like cardboard. The build quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Robe

customer_reviews.title: Beats Beats.
customer_reviews.text: These are some quality headphones for someone on a budget. Seeing how everyone loves Beats, these sound and feel much more crisp/comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Hale

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about these headphones,they sound very good,I use them for my Marshall amp and the sound is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: ernest martin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones, I have been using it for 2 years. Usually, I use them 2-3 hours a day. They are still in a good shape. The sound is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Yevhen Vovkohon

customer_reviews.title: can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.text: purchased the Beats Pro but found them bulky and lacking a bit. Tried these on at a local store and purchased 2 on amazon. Use for recording. (band mates use them and love them.)
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: All in all a good experience. Slight hiccup with Australia Post and their ...
customer_reviews.text: All in all a good experience. Slight hiccup with Australia Post and their delivery but eventually received the goods. The headphones themselves are very comfortable and perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Ashford

customer_reviews.title: Finally got my Marshall's!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love 'em. Got a GREAT price. Tried to find Bluetooth and noise cancelling but they technology just isn't there yet for over the ear. This will be fine for my uses.
customer_reviews.author: D. Putman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. They're comfortable and sounds amazing. Glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use this for my guitar and it's really amazing
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my guitar and it's really amazing
customer_reviews.author: Bibek

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very muffled, sounds like you're listening to music from another room.

customer_reviews.title: There's a new Marshall in town.....
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful to behold, a symphony to hear: these headphones produce brilliant sound, then again, what else would you expect?......they're Marshall's.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: only the best, Marshall!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. It would be nice if you have a good mp3 to enjoy music and relaxing while in the bus, otw to work.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, golden parts look great, the only disadvantage is that the headphone pressure is not so comfortable.

I had yo say that, cause the sound is great, confort is good look is great mostly because of the sound is why i think these headphones are awesome, i bought the Marshall minor fx first, They are They do have a great sound and because of that is why i got the Marshall mayor and They are Just what i was expecting They to be

customer_reviews.title: This headphones are what happens when a company get it right.
customer_reviews.text: This things are made solid, do yourself a favor and buy this headphones.

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding headphones
customer_reviews.text: Better sounding than some of the other headphones on the market that cost more - no frills or cultural statements, they just sound great! Have 4 sets in the household...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones I love them and I would suggest these to anyone and everyone.

customer_reviews.title: the sound is good and meets the price
customer_reviews.text: the sound is good and meets the price, but it's too tight and pressing on my head. the built and material quality is excelent.

customer_reviews.title: fake marshall headphone
customer_reviews.text: It is not an original marshall headphone. The sound with bluetooth is noisy and bad.
customer_reviews.author: abricot

customer_reviews.title: Was very pleased when i got the headphones
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased when i got the headphones, the sound is clear, and not tinny, and the bass is great, comparable to the Dr.Dre Beats line.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: ОТЛИЧНАЯ ГАРНИТУРА
customer_reviews.text: excellent headphones for those who need high-quality sound and design convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these a few days ago and at first it took me a couple of hours to get used to them because I was used to my old in-ear headphones. The sound is amazing the bass, mids and highs are well balanced and one does not overpower the other. I'm no audiophile but I can tell when something sounds good and these headphones do. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Agustin

customer_reviews.title: Steal!! These headphones rock!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most stylish, comfortable headphones out there with great sound. Though I appreciate what they were trying to do with the ear cup inserts, I prefer a cleaner sound so i leave them out. But they sound great! I have been using them for a year now and extensively this week for an online class and they have been awesome. Great buy, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great Headphones. Sound awesome with or without the filter for the earpieces. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ktruong

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but what would you expect from a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, but what would you expect from a company with the long history such as Marshall. I like my music a little brighter so I decided to remove the FTF felt which gives a little more treble. Definitely glad I went we these at this price point instead of the Bose or the Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound, worthy of the Marshall name. Comfortable, and very functional. The second headphone jack for sharing is a great idea!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephenralls6

customer_reviews.title: Cool and great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, workmanship is very high quality and the price is right. I would recommend over other brands like Bose, Monster or Beats Audio.
customer_reviews.author: L. MINICK

customer_reviews.title: These headphones however are not only comfortable and look awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have been in search for a solid pair of headphones for EVER. I always find myself reverting back to my EarPods that come with my iPhone. These headphones however are not only comfortable and look awesome, but they sound amazing. They have a very warm sound to them, and they seem to have some noise canceling properties as well. I use them for everything: Music listening, drumming, and PC gaming. They fold up really nice and also give you the option to move the wire to either headphone which is very convenient for wire management while drumming. I've had them for about a month now and I can only hope they hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: soccerman19

customer_reviews.title: Love'em!
customer_reviews.text: I'm no DJ or serious music listener but these things have blown me away! The sound is awesome. I haven't even messed with the felt system as of yet because they seem just right for me as is. I'd highly suggest these for anyone looking for a quality sound product and not caught up in the trendy brands with celeb endorsements. I've tried the Beats, etc and wasnt really all that impressed. The base of those seem solid but other seem lacking in other areas of songs. The Marshall's have killer bass, way better than I expected, and amazing mid-range with solid highs. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Davis

customer_reviews.title: Glad I could get one of the few last pairs ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this a while ago. Lost them. Glad I could get one of the few last pairs they made. Use them for professional mixing.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, my song is so happy with the item

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas (he's a drummer) and he absolutely LOVES them!

customer_reviews.title: BUY BUY BUY
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING HEADPHONES! i own the Marshall general, and this exceeds it by miles! TOTALLY comfortable and great sound quality. Though sometimes it plays weirdly, but its probably from the chord. LOVE IT

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: Great, less expensive option to Beats by Dre. The pricing on amazon was significantly less than Best Buy.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful bass and sleek design
customer_reviews.text: Stellar sound only drawback is lack of swiveling ear cups but the BASS makes it worth it to me. Great compact breakdown to transport without breaking them. I love the look and feel of them. The ear cups are on the smallish side but fully cover my ears.

customer_reviews.title: great headphones
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and they lived up to their reviews on the product. I would recommend them to anyone,

customer_reviews.text: This are amazing! Really good sound, sturdy construction and very nice rock looking. I listened to Beats, Bose and others and decide for Marshall's, very pleased. Also, over-the-ear design is very comfortable for long listening periods. Second headphones connector in a very smart feature these days.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good earphone, its beautiful and the quality is also ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good earphone, its beautiful and the quality is also very good. The voice quality of this earphone in high Streicher Violoncello Tiefe Lage has a very excellent performance. I think this earphone is very suit for listening to the Rock & Roll and soundtrack.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light weight over-ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for two years. Still in love with it! Excellent sound quality and bass is not overwhelming.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality for a good price, beyond my expectations.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing pair of headphones! The amount of bass it gives is just the right amount and it shuts out the world pretty great when you put them on.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones!! I have trouble finding headphones that fit my small head, and these fit me very well and also have very good sound quality.

customer_reviews.title: look awesome, sound good not great
customer_reviews.text: Sound good, unless you've put on the mx50's. Ear cup size is extremedy small, hurt my ears and took a while to find a decent angle where my ears actually fit somewhat comfortably. Look very cool, though.
